title: Snail on a dewy moss
description: A little snail in the morning light
author: Nikita

title: Night and day
description: A girl running with a starry veil
author: Nikita

title: Three Men in a Boat: To Say Nothing of the Dog
description: Throw the lumber over, man! Let your boat of life be light, packed with only what you need – a homely home and simple pleasures, one or two friends, worth the name, someone to love and someone to love you, a cat, a dog, and a pipe or two, enough to eat and enough to wear, and a little more than enough to drink; for thirst is a dangerous thing.
author: Nikita

title: In the Heart of the Wood and What I Found There
description: Lots of birds are waiting for you behind the trees
author: Richard
